title: A Blast - I ekrixi (2014 - Greece) [subtitles] thriller
description:
A Blast - 2014                   I ekrixi                  Î· ÎˆÎºÏÎ·Î¾Î·

(Greece, Germany, Netherlands, Italy, Bosnia and Herzegovina, France)

Drama / Thriller

director . . . . Syllas Tzoumerkas
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3813916/


Hellenic Film Academy - NOMINATED - Best Film
Sarajevo Film Festival - NOMINATED - Best Film

Filmed at Athens and Pieria, Greece | Hamburg, Germany

The Greek financial crisis drives a young woman to dynamite her life and start over. When Thelma and Louise ran away, they were fleeing their boring lives, but at least they had cash in the bank. When the heroine of A Blast, Maria, runs away she's fleeing the suffering imposed on her by a global economic crisis that has hit the world hard, and her country, Greece, perhaps hardest. It is a crisis which has forced people everywhere to re-evaluate downwards their expectations of the world, but Maria's having none of that. She wants out, and A Blast, Syllas Tzoumerkas's second film, is the frantic, unsettling and intriguing record of her journey, a journey more emotional than literal. The watching viewer is strapped in beside her, along for the ride, hair blown back.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 720x428, 24.000 fps, 1624 Kbps, 01h23m03s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, Greek audio with some English and German

Optional subtitles English, Russian, Serbian
